filmography.title: Double Whoopee
filmography.role_description: A stunning blonde who has a memorable comedic encounter involving a car door and a dress in this Laurel and Hardy short.
filmography.plot: A hotel doorman and a footman cause chaos in a posh hotel, including an incident with a visiting prince.

filmography.title: The Saturday Night Kid
filmography.role_description: A jealous sister who tries to steal her sibling's boyfriend in this early Clara Bow talkie.
filmography.plot: Two sisters who work in a department store fight over the same man.

filmography.title: New York Nights
filmography.role_description: A minor role as a party guest in Norma Talmadge's first sound film.
filmography.plot: A chorus girl marries a racketeer who wants to produce a show for her, but struggles with his criminal life.

filmography.title: Hell's Angels
filmography.role_description: A seductive British aristocrat who becomes the object of affection for two brothers; the role that made Harlow a star.
filmography.plot: Two brothers attend Oxford and join the Royal Flying Corps at the outbreak of World War I.

filmography.title: The Secret Six
filmography.role_description: A stenographer who helps two reporters expose a bootlegging gang.
filmography.plot: Two reporters recruit a group of secret vigilantes to help them take down a powerful mob boss.

filmography.title: The Public Enemy
filmography.role_description: A glamorous, high-society woman who becomes the moll of rising gangster Tom Powers.
filmography.plot: A young hoodlum rises up the ranks of the Chicago underworld, but his life of crime eventually leads to tragedy.

filmography.title: Iron Man
filmography.role_description: The gold-digging wife of a prizefighter who abandons him when he loses and returns when he wins.
filmography.plot: A boxer becomes champion but loses his drive and his wife, forcing him to fight for redemption.

filmography.title: Goldie
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman who becomes the center of a rivalry between two sailors.
filmography.plot: A sailor travels from port to port, always stealing the girlfriends of his shipmate, until they meet Goldie.
filmography.awards: Remake of 'A Girl in Every Port'

filmography.title: Platinum Blonde
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who impulsively marries a wisecracking reporter, earning Harlow her famous nickname.
filmography.plot: A snobbish heiress marries a down-to-earth reporter, but their class differences threaten their marriage.

filmography.title: Three Wise Girls
filmography.role_description: A small-town girl who moves to New York City to become a model and faces the temptations of the big city.
filmography.plot: Three friends working as models in New York City try to navigate romance and wealth without losing their integrity.

filmography.title: The Beast of the City
filmography.role_description: A gangster's moll who seduces a police captain's younger brother to protect her criminal boyfriend.
filmography.plot: A police captain is determined to take down a gang leader, even when his own brother becomes involved with the gangster's girlfriend.

filmography.title: Red-Headed Woman
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, homewrecking secretary who sleeps her way to the top of society without remorse.
filmography.plot: A young woman uses sex and manipulation to break up a marriage and advance her social standing.

filmography.title: Red Dust
filmography.role_description: A wisecracking prostitute on the run who finds herself in a love triangle on a rubber plantation in Indochina.
filmography.plot: On a rubber plantation in Indochina, the overseer falls for the wife of a new employee, while also contending with a prostitute on the run.

filmography.title: Hold Your Man
filmography.role_description: A tough Brooklyn girl who falls for a con artist and ends up in a reformatory to protect him.
filmography.plot: A con man and a hard-luck girl fall in love, but their criminal pasts catch up with them.

filmography.title: Dinner at Eight
filmography.role_description: The vulgar, cheating wife of a nouveau riche businessman who clashes with her husband while trying to break into high society.
filmography.plot: A high-society dinner party highlights the dramas, loves, and financial struggles of its eccentric guests.

filmography.title: Bombshell
filmography.role_description: A Hollywood sex symbol who yearns for a normal life and respectability but is constantly thwarted by her studio publicist.
filmography.plot: A movie star tries to escape the craziness of Hollywood and her leeching family, but her press agent won't let her go.

filmography.title: The Girl from Missouri
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl determined to marry a millionaire without sacrificing her virtue.
filmography.plot: A determined young woman moves to New York City to find a rich husband but finds that millionaires are harder to catch than she thought.

filmography.title: Reckless
filmography.role_description: A Broadway star whose marriage to a wealthy man ends in scandal, forcing her to rebuild her life.
filmography.plot: A musical stage star's life is ruined by scandal after her wealthy husband dies, and her old friend tries to clear her name.

filmography.title: China Seas
filmography.role_description: A brassy, devoted mistress of a ship captain who helps him fight off pirates and weather storms.
filmography.plot: The captain of a steamer traveling from Hong Kong to Singapore risks his life and ship to protect a gold shipment from pirates.

filmography.title: Riffraff
filmography.role_description: A cannery worker who sacrifices her freedom for her fisherman boyfriend, engaging in a Tuna industry strike.
filmography.plot: A fisherman and a cannery worker fall in love but are torn apart by a strike and a series of misunderstandings.

filmography.title: Wife vs. Secretary
filmography.role_description: A hyper-efficient and beautiful secretary who becomes the innocent subject of her boss's wife's jealousy.
filmography.plot: A publisher's wife begins to suspect that his relationship with his secretary goes beyond business.

filmography.title: Suzy
filmography.role_description: An American showgirl in WWI London who marries a French pilot, believing her first husband was murdered.
filmography.plot: A showgirl thinks her husband has been killed and flees to Paris, where she marries a famous pilot, only to find her first husband is alive.

filmography.title: Libeled Lady
filmography.role_description: The long-suffering fiancée of a newspaper editor who is manipulated into a fake marriage scheme to save the paper.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor hires a gigolo to compromise an heiress who is suing his paper for libel.

filmography.title: Personal Property
filmography.role_description: A widow in debt who is courted by a man posing as a sheriff's officer assigned to watch her assets.
filmography.plot: A man just out of prison poses as a butler to get close to a woman who is being hounded by creditors.

filmography.title: Saratoga
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a horse breeder who clashes with a bookie; Harlow died during production, and the film was finished with a double.
filmography.plot: A bookie and the daughter of a horse breeder clash over the family farm and a racehorse.
filmography.awards: Highest Grossing Film of 1937 / Final Role
